name: family-todo-app
description: Family Todo App - MCP-powered task management for families

scripts.dev: docker compose run --rm -p 4321:4321 -p 3001:3001 -e POCKETBASE_URL=http://pocketbase-dev:8090 runner npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev -w @family-todo/frontend & npm run dev -w @family-todo/mcp & wait
scripts.build: npm run build -w @family-todo/frontend && npm run build -w @family-todo/mcp
scripts.test: npm run test -w @family-todo/mcp && npm run test -w @family-todo/frontend
scripts.docker:reset-test-db: docker compose down pocketbase-test && docker volume rm -f levino-todo-app_pb_data_test && docker compose up -d pocketbase-test && sleep 2
scripts.docker:test: npm run docker:reset-test-db && docker compose run --rm runner npm test
scripts.docker:test:mcp: npm run docker:reset-test-db && docker compose run --rm runner npm run test:mcp
